title: Forget the M3 and grab a 13-inch MacBook Air for just $899
content:
Macworld

If you’re looking for a new laptop, you can’t go wrong with the 13-inch MacBook Air, especially when the discount is this deep: Best Buy is selling the 13-inch MacBook Air with 256GB of storage for $899, a savings of $200 and the best price we’ve ever seen.

The 13-inch MacBook Air has an incredibly thin and light design that makes it easy to slip into a bag or backpack. Its Liquid Retina display is remarkably crisp and bright with super-skinny bezels. You’ll also get a speedy M2 processor, all-day battery life, MagSafe for fast charging, two Thunderbolt ports, and Apple’s excellent Magic Keyboard.

In our 4.5-star review, we praised the 13-inch MacBook Air’s new design and speedy chip, and called it “the best Mac laptop choice for most people.” And it’s even easier to recommend at this price.
